name: Putty Sim. 2 (Horror)
description:
Putty Sim. 2 is a game about you receiving a Putty that you need to take care of. This isn't an ordinary Putty, though, it's family figures out who has their Putty, and aren't too happy about it either. Wind up the music box by holding it to soothe Putty, and turn off the lights if he is looking at you. Close the window by clicking it if you see someone, and open it when you hear them leave. Don't keep the window closed, though, or Putty might get upset. And watch out for Grand Pa. He doesn't like to see Putty unhappy. Survive 5 in-game hours (5 minutes) to win!

Click the blue window at the top left to fullscreen and the green flag to begin.

You may need Scratch 2.0 installed to run.

Putty Sim. 1 can be found here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/237167019/#player

Credit to Scratch and Audacity.
